verses.verse: And He looked <S%G308><s%> up and saw <S%G3708><s%> the rich <S%G4145><s%> putting <S%G906><s%> their gifts <S%G1435><s%> into the treasury. <S%G1049><s%>
And He saw <S%G3708><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> poor <S%G3998><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> putting <S%G906><s%> in two <S%G1417><s%> small <S%G3016><s%> copper <S%G3016><s%> coins. <S%G3016><s%>

And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Truly <S%G230><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, this <S%G3778><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> put <S%G906><s%> in more <S%G4183><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> [of them;]

for they all <S%G3956><s%> out of their surplus <S%G4052><s%> put <S%G906><s%> into the offering; <S%G1435><s%> but she out of her poverty <S%G5303><s%> put <S%G906><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> that she had <S%G2192><s%> to live <S%G979><s%> on. "

And while some <S%G5100><s%> were talking <S%G3004><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the temple, <S%G2413><s%> that it was adorned <S%G2885><s%> with beautiful <S%G2570><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> and votive <S%G334><s%> gifts, <S%G334><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%>

"[As for] these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you are looking <S%G2334><s%> at, the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> there will not be left <S%G863><s%> one stone <S%G3037><s%> upon another <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> will not be torn <S%G2647><s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>"

And they questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> will these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> be? And what <S%G5101><s%> [will be] the sign <S%G4592><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> are about <S%G3195><s%> to take <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%>?"

And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "See <S%G991><s%> to it that you be not misled; <S%G4105><s%> for many <S%G4183><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> in My name, <S%G3686><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'I am <S%G1510><s%> [He],' and, 'The time <S%G2540><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>'; do not go <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> them.

"And when <S%G3752><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> of wars <S%G4171><s%> and disturbances, <S%G181><s%> do not be terrified; <S%G4422><s%> for these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> take <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> first, <S%G4413><s%> but the end <S%G5056><s%> [does] not [follow] immediately. <S%G2112><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> He continued by saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Nation <S%G1484><s%> will rise <S%G1453><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and kingdom <S%G932><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> kingdom, <S%G932><s%>

and there will be great <S%G3173><s%> earthquakes, <S%G4578><s%> and in various <S%G2596><s%> places <S%G5117><s%> plagues <S%G3061><s%> and famines; <S%G3042><s%> and there will be terrors <S%G5400><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"But before <S%G4253><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> they will lay <S%G1911><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> on you and will persecute <S%G1377><s%> you, delivering <S%G3860><s%> you to the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> and prisons, <S%G5438><s%> bringing <S%G520><s%> you before <S%G1909><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> and governors <S%G2232><s%> for My name's sake. <S%G1752><s%>
"It will lead <S%G576><s%> to an opportunity for your testimony. <S%G3142><s%>
"So <S%G3767><s%> make <S%G5087><s%> up your minds <S%G2588><s%> not to prepare <S%G4304><s%> beforehand <S%G4304><s%> to defend <S%G626><s%> yourselves;

for I will give <S%G1325><s%> you utterance <S%G4750><s%> and wisdom <S%G4678><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> <S%G537><s%> of your opponents <S%G480><s%> will be able <S%G1410><s%> to resist <S%G436><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> refute. <S%G471><s%>

"But you will be delivered <S%G3860><s%> up even <S%G2532><s%> by parents <S%G1118><s%> and brothers <S%G80><s%> and relatives <S%G4773><s%> and friends, <S%G5384><s%> and they will put <S%G2289><s%> [some] of you to death, <S%G2289><s%>
and you will be hated <S%G3404><s%> by all <S%G3956><s%> on account <S%G1223><s%> of My name. <S%G3686><s%>
"Yet <S%G2532><s%> not a hair <S%G2359><s%> of your head <S%G2776><s%> will perish. <S%G622><s%>
"By your endurance <S%G5281><s%> you will gain <S%G2932><s%> your lives. <S%G5590><s%>

"But when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> surrounded <S%G2944><s%> by armies, <S%G4760><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> recognize <S%G1097><s%> that her desolation <S%G2050><s%> is at hand. <S%G1448><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> let those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are in Judea <S%G2453><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> to the mountains, <S%G3735><s%> and let those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are in the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the city <S%G846><s%> depart, <S%G1633><s%> and let not those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are in the country <S%G5561><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> the city; <S%G846><s%>

because <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are days <S%G2250><s%> of vengeance, <S%G1557><s%> in order that all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> which are written <S%G1125><s%> may be fulfilled. <S%G4092><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who are with child <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> and to those <S%G3588><s%> who nurse <S%G2337><s%> babes <S%G2337><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days; <S%G2250><s%> for there will be great <S%G3173><s%> distress <S%G318><s%> upon the land, <S%G1093><s%> and wrath <S%G3709><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%>

and they will fall <S%G4098><s%> by the edge <S%G4750><s%> of the sword, <S%G3162><s%> and will be led <S%G163><s%> captive <S%G163><s%> into all <S%G3956><s%> the nations; <S%G1484><s%> and Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> will be trampled <S%G3961><s%> under <S%G3961><s%> foot by the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the times <S%G2540><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

"And there will be signs <S%G4592><s%> in sun <S%G2246><s%> and moon <S%G4582><s%> and stars, <S%G798><s%> and upon the earth <S%G1093><s%> dismay <S%G4928><s%> among nations, <S%G1484><s%> in perplexity <S%G640><s%> at the roaring <S%G2279><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%> and the waves, <S%G4535><s%>

men <S%G444><s%> fainting <S%G674><s%> from fear <S%G5401><s%> and the expectation <S%G4329><s%> of the things which are coming <S%G1904><s%> upon the world; <S%G3625><s%> for the powers <S%G1411><s%> of the heavens <S%G3772><s%> will be shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

"And then <S%G5119><s%> they will see <S%G3708><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in a cloud <S%G3507><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%> and great <S%G4183><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

"But when these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> begin <S%G757><s%> to take <S%G1096><s%> place, <S%G1096><s%> straighten <S%G352><s%> up and lift <S%G1869><s%> up your heads, <S%G2776><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> your redemption <S%G629><s%> is drawing <S%G1448><s%> near. <S%G1448><s%>"
And He told <S%G3004><s%> them a parable: <S%G3850><s%> "Behold <S%G3708><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the trees; <S%G1186><s%>

as soon <S%G3752><s%> <S%G2235><s%> as they put <S%G4261><s%> forth <S%G4261><s%> [leaves,] you see <S%G991><s%> it and know <S%G1097><s%> for yourselves <S%G1438><s%> that summer <S%G2330><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> near. <S%G1451><s%>

"Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> you, too, <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> happening, <S%G1096><s%> recognize <S%G1097><s%> that the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is near. <S%G1451><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> will not pass <S%G3928><s%> away <S%G3928><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> take <S%G1096><s%> place. <S%G1096><s%>
"Heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth <S%G1093><s%> will pass <S%G3928><s%> away, <S%G3928><s%> but My words <S%G3056><s%> will not pass <S%G3928><s%> away. <S%G3928><s%>

"Be on guard, <S%G4337><s%> that your hearts <S%G2588><s%> may not be weighted <S%G916><s%> down <S%G916><s%> with dissipation <S%G2897><s%> and drunkenness <S%G3178><s%> and the worries <S%G3308><s%> of life, <S%G982><s%> and that day <S%G2250><s%> come <S%G2186><s%> on you suddenly <S%G160><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a trap; <S%G3803><s%>
for it will come <S%G7076><s%> upon all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G2521><s%> on the face <S%G4383><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

"But keep <S%G69><s%> on the alert <S%G69><s%> at all <S%G3956><s%> times, <S%G2540><s%> praying <S%G1189><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that you may have <S%G2729><s%> strength <S%G2729><s%> to escape <S%G1628><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> that are about <S%G3195><s%> to take <S%G1096><s%> place, <S%G1096><s%> and to stand <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man. <S%G444><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> during the day <S%G2250><s%> He was teaching <S%G1321><s%> in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> but at evening <S%G3571><s%> He would go <S%G1831><s%> out and spend <S%G835><s%> the night <S%G835><s%> on the mount <S%G3735><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> Olivet. <S%G1638><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> would get <S%G3719><s%> up early <S%G3719><s%> in the morning <S%G3719><s%> [to come] to Him in the temple <S%G2413><s%> to listen <S%G191><s%> to Him.
